about_the_game:
About:::An engaging gameplay with real beauty character doing real dance steps in the all possible ways. - Play with model having total control for you to move in which ever direction you want with 360 degree support. - Train your fingers and follow all the beaches to take the ultimate experience. Get ready to hip-hop, freestyle , belly dance and other all form dance for your way to glory. The best dance application is here. How to play: ☆Control the model via playable button. locate the various figurine and click over to perform the straight away various dancing steps.

Product Features:::
☆ Choose your Dance Steps - Choose to play with the model.

☆ Black and White (Monochrome Mode) Supported.
☆ Spot Player- You can control spot and brightness control.

☆ Beaches - Dance in different environments on different beaches .

☆ Ninety (90 +) dance steps.
☆ 360 Degree player rotation control even when player is performing dance which give view from all angle.

content_descriptors.notes: The Game contains few dancing steps which may not be appropriate for all Audiences.

detailed_description:
About:::An engaging gameplay with real beauty character doing real dance steps in the all possible ways. - Play with model having total control for you to move in which ever direction you want with 360 degree support. - Train your fingers and follow all the beaches to take the ultimate experience. Get ready to hip-hop, freestyle , belly dance and other all form dance for your way to glory. The best dance application is here. How to play: ☆Control the model via playable button. locate the various figurine and click over to perform the straight away various dancing steps.

Product Features:::
☆ Choose your Dance Steps - Choose to play with the model.

☆ Black and White (Monochrome Mode) Supported.
☆ Spot Player- You can control spot and brightness control.

☆ Beaches - Dance in different environments on different beaches .

☆ Ninety (90 +) dance steps.
☆ 360 Degree player rotation control even when player is performing dance which give view from all angle.
name: Virtual ULTIMATE Beach Dancer [HD+]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Windows® 10, Windows® 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or over, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics or NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 or over, AMD Radeon RX550 or over, 1280x720
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played.
  • Additional Notes: ※If you are using Windows® 11, the system requirements for Windows® 11 apply.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Windows® 10, Windows® 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or over, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or over, AMD Radeon RX 580 or over, 1920x1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played.
  • Additional Notes: ※If you are using Windows® 11, the system requirements for Windows® 11 apply.

short_description: Virtual ULTIMATE Beach Dancer [HD+] for your Windows devices...
